questions_and_notes: why does this variable have depth0m, but fgco2abio-Oyr doesn't?  I think depth0m should be removed because the standard_name already provides this information.
specific_issues: 2:Modify dimensions.  Add or remove scalar coordinate.
8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon as Abiotic CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
comment: Gas exchange flux of abiotic CO2 (positive into ocean)
